Package com.example.butter

Class HomeEntrantFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.butter.HomeEntrantFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HomeEntrantFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
This fragment is used to set up the home screen on the entrants / entrants + organizers side. As an entrant, the user only has access to the entrants screen and won't be able to see the admins spinner. Outstanding Issue: Only shows three events at a time in waiting list and upcoming list.

  • Nested Class Summary
